name: Vicious (Season 2)
summary: A second series has been confirmed for a mid-2014 start. The series will again consist of six episodes. It has not yet been confirmed which characters will appear again apart from the characters of Freddie and Stuart.
info:
• 中文名: 极品基老伴 第二季
  • 主演: Ian McKellen
  • 别名: 基阳红 第二季
  • 集数: 6
  • 开始: 2015-06-01
  • 结束: 2015-07-06
  • 类型: 喜剧 / 同性
  • 国家/地区: 英国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 频道: ITV

eps.name: Sister
eps.desc: Violet panics when her wealthy sister Lillian (Celia Imrie) - whom she has not seen in years - announces a visit. Worried that Lillian will discover the truth about her circumstances, Violet and friends set in motion an elaborate plan to save her from humiliation. Meanwhile, Ash is keen to introduce the group to his new girlfriend, Jess - but he is in for a surprise.

eps.name: Gym
eps.desc: Feeling unfit, Freddie and Stuart join Ash at his gym, where a young fitness instructor persuades the pair to sign up for an expensive membership. With Freddie and Stuart spending so much time at the gym, Violet and Penelope discover how pleasant their flat can be without the bickering pair in it.

eps.name: Stag Do
eps.desc: Finding themselves both single, Violet and Ash consider dating new people, Violet has already met someone on the internet, while Ash's ex, Chloe (Alexandra Roach), returns. Freddie, meanwhile, feels under pressure from Stuart to land a new acting role.
